title: Circular (Safety): Updated guidelines for Slope Stability in Opencast Mines.
summary: DGMS issues new comprehensive guidelines for ensuring slope stability in all opencast workings, effective 01/12/2025. All mine managers are required to submit compliance reports.

title: Notice: Workshop on new Safety Management Plan (SMP) Portal.
summary: A one-day workshop will be held on 15/11/2025 to train stakeholders on the new online portal for SMP submission and tracking.

title: Alert: Increased vigilance required for methane detection in underground coal mines.
summary: Following recent incidents, DGMS directs all U/G coal mines to increase the frequency of methane checks and ensure calibration of all detection equipment.

title: Inquiry report submitted for Godavari Khani (GDK-5) roof fall incident.
summary: The DGMS inquiry team has submitted its preliminary report on the GDK-5 incline incident in Telangana, citing violations in roof support as per Regulation 108.

title: Quarterly Safety Audit: ECL's Rajmahal mine flagged for transport machinery.
summary: The quarterly internal safety audit at ECL's Rajmahal OCP (Jharkhand) noted multiple violations related to dumper and dozer operations, recommending immediate corrective action.

title: Illegal coal mining operation busted; 12 arrested.
summary: Dhanbad police, in a joint raid with the district mining task force, busted an illegal 'rat-hole' mining operation in the Jharia coalfield area. Tools and illegally extracted coal were seized.

title: BCCL plans to expand Jharia coking coal output by 15%.
summary: Bharat Coking Coal Limited (BCCL) has announced a new expansion plan for its Jharia operations, aiming to increase coking coal production to meet rising steel demands.

title: Protest by workers at a BCCL colliery over safety concerns.
summary: Workers at the Kusunda Area colliery held a protest demanding enhanced safety measures and new personal protective equipment (PPE) following a minor incident last week.
